name: ODINS BEARD (or some other name)
description:
Thanks for trying (INSERT CLEVER TITLE HERE). Build units and deploy their special abilities to defend your village. Gold is gained over time, units build Rage by attacking. By filling their Rage bar, they can deploy their special abilities. 

Left click to select a unit, left click again to send them to a point. You cannot currently attack directly. Right click to unselect. Healing is functional (lower right), the barrage special ability is not. 

Two levels are currently playable, hope you enjoy!
